Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.16075425] Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli(MIC>100 μM);Gram-positive bacterium:Bacillus subtilis(MIC>100 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.16075425] It has 1% hemolysis at 100 μM against erythrocytes.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Escherichia coli and Bacillus subtilis. Has hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: Structure of the antimicrobial, cationic hexapeptide cyclo(RRWWRF) and its analogues in solution and bound to detergent micelles.
